thread.title_full: Ground News - Scotland falls to St. Pauls in 1st round of Bladen Offroad Christmas Tournament

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Scotland falls to St. Pauls in 1st round of Bladen Offroad Christmas Tournament
text:
Summary by Ground News The Fighting Scots fall to 3-7 on the season, and the Bulldogs improve to 7-3. Scotland will face the loser of Whiteville/North Brunswick on Friday at 2 p.m. in the consolation round. Donel Thomas led the Bulldogs with 17 points; Tyson Thompson followed with 14 points. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Laurinburg Exchange Media Conglomerate: Champion Media Scotland falls to St. Pauls in 1st round of Bladen Offroad Christmas Tournament BLADENBORO — The Scotland men’s basketball team fell to the St. Pauls Bulldogs 66-36 Thursday afternoon in the first round of the Bladen Offroad Christmas Tournament. The Fighting Scots fall to 3-7 on the season, and the Bulldogs improve to 7-3. Dylan Lampley led the way in scoring for Scotland, finishing with 13 points; Quatavius Everette followed with nine points… Source
